Package org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks

Class ReadWriteTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks.InternalTask
      • org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks.ReadWriteTask
  • public abstract class ReadWriteTask
extends InternalTask
    Provides an abstract base for read/write tasks.

      • execute

        public ModifiableFileSet execute​(FileSet input,
                                 BaseFolder output)
                          throws InternalTaskException

        Apply the task to input and place the result in output.

        Note: Resources in the input file set that are not modified, but should be included in the output file set, should preferably keep their locations in the input file set for performance reasons. This may not always be possible, depending on the processing requirements in the implementation of this method.

        Parameters:
        input - input file set
        output - output location
        Returns:
        the output file set
        Throws:
        InternalTaskException - throws InternalTaskException if something goes wrong.
